item.title: Is Alibaba truly the top player in the e-commerce industry?
item.description:
While Alibaba Group Holding is often called the world’s biggest e-commerce company, a new report from yStats.com suggests that this depends on how you interpret the data. The report, which ranks companies based on official revenue figures, found that Amazon was the actual leader in 2013. Amazon’s impressive $74 billion in product and service sales surpasses the combined revenue of the next nine companies on the list. Chinese B2C retailer JD...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/is-alibaba-truly-the-top-player-in-the-e-commerce-industry/
